attributes.action: Stop the football  with the kalimah shahada written on it for world cup
attributes.background:
We protest against the usage of kalimah syahadah on the Saudi Arabia flag on any of your World Cup 2018 merchandise and ball.

It is degrading for Islam if the kalimah syahadah is being kick around if it's on the ball.

We want you to call back all merchandise and ball from the market.
